text:
Plenty of mothers dress their daughters in their likeness, but perhaps none do it better than Kim Kardashian West and her mini-me North West. Factor in their extensive designer-heavy wardrobes and the fact that Kim launched a kids' line with the primary goal for them to dress in similar fashion, it's no wonder their twinning moments provide ample inspiration.

"It's been such a fun journey to figure out how our kids like to dress and how to make cool clothes for kids," Kim once said of her and Kanye's children's brand Kids Supply. "We've always been tailoring things and cutting things up, or taking dresses of mine and cutting them down to North's size."

So on North's birthday, CR went through the archives and unearthed North and Kim's best mommy-and-me looks, from matching sequined Vetements dresses to their Moncler puffers.
title: North West and Kim Kardashian West's Twinning Moments
